title: Sony A7C Review: a little ripper!
description: The Sony A7C is a small in size, big in specs full-frame camera with a large ISO range, 24.2MP sensor, and fast autofocus. Coming in at $1,800, it has the sensor, processor, and autofocus system of 2018s A7 III in a body thats closer in size to the A6600. Becca Farsace has the full review.
